## getOpenApiSchema variable

This method can be used to generate an OpenAPIv3 schema to describe how the methods of a Veramo agent can be called remotely.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOpenApiSchema: (
  agent: IAgent,
  basePath: string,
  exposedMethods: Array<string>,
  name?: string,
  version?: string,
) => OpenAPIV3.Document
```
